Replace.Text: Carlotin
Carlotine Empire
Carlotine's
Edward Mallo

Emperor Marius I, you are the master of the eastern wilderness. You have been a soldier and horse all your life, creating a unified Carotingian Empire and a prosperous age for the Carotingians! May the dragon bless you, use your sharp sword to pierce the enemy army, use your iron cavalry to break through the enemy's formation, and rule the world
The major events of the country are enshrined in Rong
Morv II

White Jade Emperor Morv II, you are the God of the Carotines. Even though the previous dynasty was poor and weak, you still led the Carotines to the top. May you be immortal! Great emperor, you will once again follow the will of the gods to create a prosperous and prosperous Carlotin dynasty.
I am God

Pioneers +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power, cities built on flat deserts or snow or frozen soil will get roads connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] capital (if within the capital's trade range), and build [ICON_TRADINGPOST] trade posts , the city can build an additional [ICON_DISTRICT] area regardless of the [ICON_CITIZEN] population. The desert, snow, and frozen soil within the city limits provide 2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology, and 1 [ICON_CULTURE] culture. [NEWLINE] [ICON_CAPITAL] capital and cities built on flat desert or snow or frozen soil that are more than 5 cells away from the original capital, [ICON_PRESSUREUP] loyalty +8, get a huge amount when building the first [ICON_DISTRICT] area [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity bonus. Border expansion speed +200%.
Treading rough valley

Siege unit +1 [ICON_STRENGTH] attack times +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement. Gain engineering tech when unlocking wheel tech. [NEWLINE] When occupying a city-state (the city needs to be retained), the city will permanently provide 20% corresponding bonuses to all cities according to its type (military city-states provide +8 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power for all military units), and trigger special effects according to their types:[ NEWLINE][COLOR:ResScienceLabelCS]Science and Technology City-State[ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOINGTO]3 Random[ICON_TECHBOOSTED]Eureka[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]Cultural City-State[ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOINGTO]3 Random[ICON_CIVICBOOSTED]Inspiration[NEWLINE][COLOR :ResGoldLabelCS]Trade city-state[ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOINGTO]+3[ICON_TRADEROUTE]Business route[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResFaithLabelCS]Religious city-state[ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOINGTO]Release all your cities[ICON_RELIGION]Religious pressure+50%[NEWLINE] [COLOR:ResProductionLabelCS]Industrial city-state[ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOINGTO]Worker plus 1[ICON_CHARGES]uses[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]Military city-state[ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOINGTO]All military units get a [ICON_PROMOTION] promotion.
Shiraishi Dynasty

Colleges, theater plazas, and commercial centers cannot be built. The adjacency bonus of the Holy Land area provides [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, [ICON_SCIENCE] technology and [ICON_CULTURE] culture. Unique units automatically spread your religion to surrounding cities when they kill enemies. Your unit has +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility and +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power in cities that follow your religion. When a city is occupied, it will automatically follow your religion.
May our friendship last forever.
You should be as friendly as you can be in order to be friends with the Carrotines.
Be our friend, let this long river witness our friendship
good
Very regrettable……
Whether it is yellow sand or giant river, it will become your burial place!
The horn has been sounded, my friend, the war has begun!
History has stepped into its cycle again, and I will go with it.
The wheel of history has run over me, and it will soon run over you.
The envoys of your country will receive the highest courtesy, and we value your arrival.
We will talk about this topic next time.
Our delegation has brought generous gifts.
It just shows that you are afraid of us!
You are a tyrant, and you are going to hell with your people. [NEWLINE] (condemns you)
I am the founder of the new Carotine dynasty, the leader of the Sandboat Knights, and the emperor of the Carotine people. Are you a hero full of honors, or a villain full of crimes?
Welcome to Carlotin, we invite you to be our guest in Long Valley!
thank you, friend
Vulcaro is located in the lower reaches of the Karotin River, deep in the wild valley. Now, tell us about your capital city!
Hello.
These city-states, they are self-interested speculators, and it is a great mistake to count on them.
(You are not attacking or allied with a city-state)
I will sweep these city-states one by one, I believe you do not want to be implicated in this!
(You are conquering or allying with a city-state)
Do you want to be an ally?
War is no longer sacred, and it will be pointless to continue.
This matter is far from over!
Let's put down our guns and let this war end.
Araratani opens its doors to you.
The Carrotines no longer let you enter Desolation.
We hope you will let us go, friend.
You and your army, their arrival is meaningless, please remove them.
{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_MARIUS_I_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_MARIUS_I_ANY}
The gods bear witness to our friendship.
We cannot accept it.
Are you willing to be our friend and become a follower of the gods together?
very good.
You are a stubborn person...
I didn't ascend to the throne by crowds of believers alone, I will let you know that this is your worst decision!
As you can see, the war has already begun!
will be a thing of the past.
My God, please bury me in the White Jade Court.
The envoys of your country will receive the highest courtesy, and we value your arrival.
We refuse.
Our delegation has brought generous gifts.
We are never afraid!
Even the most paranoid heretic cannot tolerate a demon like you [NEWLINE] (condemns you)
I am Morv II, Emperor of the White Stone, chosen by Joa, the greatest emperor of Carlotin.
Welcome to Karotin, please come and admire our majestic temple!
Thank you, friend.
Vulcaro is located in the lower reaches of the Karotin River, deep in the wild valley. Now, tell us about your capital city!
Hello.
Only with a firm belief in your heart will you be favored by the gods.
(You follow the religion of Carlotine)
Where is your god! Lost traveler?
(You believe in heresy)
Do you want to be an ally?
Then reconcile.
Only your dead body can appease our wrath!
Let's put down our guns and let this war end.
Araratani opens its doors to you.
The Carrotines no longer let you enter Desolation.
We hope you will let us go, friend.
You and your army, their arrival is meaningless, please remove them.

sand rider

Carlotin's unique unit, instead of knights, is cheaper and more powerful. It can be purchased with faith, without maintenance costs. It comes with an [ICON_PROMOTION] upgrade, and the upgrade does not end the round. Ignores the effect of hills on [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement.
[Absolute Dust] Fatoris

Karotin's unique unique unit, the more powerful Sandboat Rider. In enemy territory [ICON_MOVEMENT] moves +3, [ICON_STRENGTH] fights +5. The attack has a 60% probability of causing 1.1 times damage, a 30% probability of causing 1.3 times damage, and a 10% probability of causing 1.5 times damage. [NEWLINE][ICON_STRENGTH] Combat power up and promotion after completing the heavy cavalry tech.
sand rider
Sandboat Rider [ICON_MOVEMENT] moves regardless of hills, upgrade does not end round

Trying to conquer more city-states, likes civilizations that don't communicate with city-states, hates civilizations that communicate with city-states

Northeast of the Hildaros continent, between the Karotin River and the Wasekon Mountains
About 5.29 million square kilometers in its heyday, and 1.5 million square kilometers in the new dynasty
about 2 million people
Forcaro
Yilan desert
wasekon
Yuting Mountain
carotin r.
Arakawa
volcaro

The origin of the Karotingians goes back to the year 2027 of the Old Age. In this year, the regent [Yhor] of the ancient Hildia Empire conspired with several great nobles to assassinate the 14-year-old emperor and came to the throne in person. As an emperor of pure dragon descent, it is no surprise that Yihor also discriminated against non-pure blood people, so shortly after he took the throne (Old Era 2029), he slowly drove out the non-pure blood people in the capital and surrounding cities. In the woodlands of the north. Among the first batch of expelled mixed-bloods, a royal knight commander named Fatoris was different. She was a pure-blooded dragon descendant. , Yihor also stuffed her into the list of refugees.

Fatoris and his party finally wandered to the desert alluvial plain along a huge river called the "Karotin River" on the northeast border of the empire, and selected rare areas that could be settled to build settlements one by one. Fatoris, who is a messenger during the day, secretly trains a group of people with lofty ideals who intend to overthrow the heretical rule of Yihor under the moonlight at night. The residents along the other coasts provided them with comprehensive support from food to harness and armor. By the beginning of 2050 in the old era, a heavy cavalry regiment of more than 1,000 people had begun to take shape. They called themselves Sandboat Knights and lived a nomadic life. After training, they helped transport goods between settlements that were far apart.

In September of this year (according to the Lakshul calendar, there are nine months in a year, and each month has 20 days), the informer messed up all the seemingly safe arrangements. At this time, Yihor was dying of illness. After learning about the Shazhou Knights, he immediately hired a group of Vasseken cavalry on the condition that he returned to the empire to live, and together with a group of imperial cavalry, he wanted to go north with the young crown prince. Eliminate all risks.

On the other hand, the Sandboat Knights fell into disagreement. Fattorius wanted to retreat beyond the borders of the empire and move towards Greywalk Forest, while a considerable number of knights were unwilling to abandon the residents and cities on the banks of the Karotin River. , intending to fight. In the end, Fatoris chose to fight head-on, but during the time of hesitation, nearly 600 half-blood knights of dragon descendants fled to Laxul...

The war lasted less than a month, and both sides suffered losses. Due to the lack of logistics, the elite sand boat knights fought to the point of desperation, and were even so hungry that they slaughtered war horses for food. Due to lack of experience, the imperial cavalry made a mistake in every step of the battle, and almost the entire army was wiped out. The Vasekans were even more unwilling to work for the empire, and together with the Carlotins, they were the same people who were expelled at the beginning, and they have been fighting passively.

When the leading army of imperial cavalry was defeated, news of Yihor's death came. Fatolis persuaded the Vasekans to march towards the capital, Longxi City, and prepare to capture the imperial capital. The new emperor was so frightened that he wrote a secret letter to seek peace, but Fatoris got enough benefits in the agreement and annexed the whole east of the empire from north to south. It was on this basis that the new card was established. Lothin Empire.

After Fatoris died in 2102 of the Old Era, because he had no heirs, Carlotin had no orthodox emperor, and internal disputes continued. Although there was a stable and unified dynasty like the Baishi Dynasty for hundreds of years, it eventually split. In 3535 of the Old Era, Vasekon formed an alliance with Hildia and prepared to go north to attack Lakshul. At that time, the Carotinian emperor Bawuk II militarily supported Vasekon and Hildia. Riots broke out everywhere, and after Bawuk II was assassinated, they quickly split into dozens of states, large and small.

It wasn't until 522 in the New Era that Edward Mario Claude conquered all the city-states along the entire Carotine River by force, and was crowned Marius I, creating the last dynasty of Carlotin, the Crow Dynasty. Although the territory of the Carlotin Empire was less than one-third of its heyday at this time, it was unprecedentedly prosperous.

It is a pity that the Crow Dynasty only lasted for more than 300 years, but it came to an abrupt end due to the incompetence of the emperor and the invasion of the Wasekon people, and it became an important province of the Wasekon Empire. Afterwards, Carlotin, together with the Wasekon Empire, was crushed by the army of the Hildia dictator [Dragni], and became the land of Hildia again. It was not until 2885 of the New Era that Emperor Dana released Karotine to become an independent country, which remains to this day.
Edward Majorl Crowe
black crow
Although he created the last and most prosperous dynasty of Carlotin, Edward Marius Crow (Edward Marius Crow) was not from Carlotin, but a noble son of pure blood.

In the year 485 of the New Era, Edward Mario Crow was born in a pocket principality called "Wyne" in the southeast of the Hildia Empire. His father was Manon of the Hildia royal family and his mother was Wyne. Third daughter of the greatest duke in the world—Ne Hiron. Due to his father's identity, Marius learned extraordinary riding skills since he was a child, and at the age of twenty he entered the Royal Military Academy of Hildia and became a cavalryman.

One of Mario's teachers, Slane of Ilan, is a descendant of a member of the Sandboat Knights, and he is also a Sandboat Knight himself. Work. Slane often vividly tells the glorious deeds of Fattorius thousands of years ago in front of the students, in the name of motivating the students, and subtly influences these young people who may see each other on the battlefield in the future.

As for Mario, although he felt Slane's overtones, Mario still had a great yearning for the desert and wasteland of Carlotin and the unrestrained sandboat knights. On the one hand, he sympathizes with what happened to the Carlotin immigrants back then, and also mourns the disastrous situation of Carlotin today; The members of the royal family also discriminated and prejudiced against the children of other nobles.

Reluctant to serve at court, Marius later became a Jiedushi, stationed in the northern frontier—a short distance from the Karotin region. Mario has worked here for more than ten years, and has a deep understanding of the history, culture, and social status of Carlotin, and has established a close relationship with the Carlotin people.

In 519 of the New Era, Emperor Perton II of Sildia succeeded to the throne and launched several suppressions against the duchies, using various bloody means to force the dukes to give up their fiefs and replace them with their own cronies, including Wynn . So, in May of this year, when Marius received a recall letter from the court, he had a bad feeling and chose to go all the way north, leaving the border of the empire.

Mario's feeling was very accurate. When he had just rushed to the southernmost city-state [Koln] on the Karotin River, the imperial army arrived at the original jurisdiction and searched all over to find Mario.

Not long after settling down in Cologne, the well-known Marius met a hermit who declared the orthodoxy of the Carlotine royal family—Duchy Bova, and hoped that Marius would help him recover the lost territory and unify Carlotine. Mario spent a whole year investigating the details of Du Xiu, and after finally confirming that it was correct, he led hundreds of Sand Boat Knights under Du Xiu to start the Northern Expedition.

Mario's journey was very smooth, but most of the city-states along the coast were powerless to resist Marius and the Sandboat Knights either because of his small size or loose organization. And because Du Xiu owned the dragon flag symbolizing the royal family, most of the residents along the way accepted their so-called orthodox rule with suspicion. In this way, relying on his iron fist, Marius helped Du Xiu capture all the cities along the Karotin River, and basically restored the land of a thousand years ago.

At the last celebration banquet, Marius announced that he would no longer lead the sand boat knights. At this time, Du Xiu suddenly put the dragon flag on Mario's shoulders, raised Mario's hand, and said: "From now on, Mario The emperor will bring the Carrotine Empire into a new era". And Marius didn't give in, and accepted the throne coveted by countless people, and used his fame and character to cover up the fact that he didn't have any royal blood in him.

Edward Mario Crow ("Crow", that is, the crow) was crowned king on October 19, 522, and established the Crow Dynasty, known as Marius I. He selected talents and talents, and cared about the people's sentiments, which made Carlotin reach a very high stage in military, economic, and cultural aspects.
